item.title: ServerlessConf'18 in San Francisco - Day One
item.description: ServerlessConf Serverless The creation of an Alexa skill in 2016 was this aha moment I discovered the concept of serverless or more precisely Function as a Service a.

item.title: Goodbye 2017!
item.description: December 31st. There are few hours left before the New Year, kids are having a nap, house is quiet. Probably the right time to reflect upon 2017, another crazy year with so many things that happened.
